message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this fantastic product. Given its incredible value and potential, I'm confident it will be a game-changer for you. I'm offering it to you for $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair price reflecting the immense benefit you'll receive.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
